content: It will be interesting to see how many trolls think “too much information is a bad thing!” And how we’ll have any interest in the “second hand” lies they offer. No, we still think the sky is blue, and the grass is green. But please keep trying, and no doubt the masses of us joined together in the name of truth and justice will be persuaded by injustice and lies! HA! (Laughter really IS the best medicine!)
